title: Can not get through champ select on new client
body: I cant even play league on this new client. Champ select is always a black screen and I cant select anything. I have received two ranked losses and lost 13 Lp. This has happened both times since I updated to the new client. I cant even play the game! So thanks riot, looks like I have an excuse to quit league, this new client is busted.

replies.body:
Getting a black screen at champion select can happen when an unstable connection that's failing to download assets.  It sucks that you've lost LP as a result, and I'd like to help!  We can't adjust game stats, but I do recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get that fixed.  The updated client is also in testing, so you are able to use the legacy client too.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if you have any questions.

I have a question, but it's unrelated to this.... I received an S- for a champion that I have just purchased, Katarina. I didn't receive a chest for it. In the Champions screen (of the old client), Katarina doesn't have the gold border that champions get when you've received a chest for them, and when you hover over her her chest icon isn't filled in, but it says "Season highest grade: S-". I am 100% positive that I had already bought her when I got the S-. Has a change been made? 

Also, I posted this in "Report A Bug", and Riot took it down due to "It being better suited for Gameplay". I'd like to know why, as it is very clearly a mistake in the game, and has absolutely nothing to do with gameplay mechanisms. Riot didn't even answer the question, they just told me to post it elsewhere, which is aggravating. If it was automated, I understand, but, regardless, I don't want to play the game if I believe that there is a problem with the Chest system. Any explanation or attention would be totally appreciated. Thanks.

It looks like you unlocked 2017-02-22 on a late evening, but don't see any S games since then.  I do see that previous do that you had not yet owned her, which is required at the time of the match.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I did buy her yesterday, on the 22nd, but I am fairly certain got an S- on this game today:

 http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2434012013/233594212?tab=overview

Of course, grades aren't shown in match history, but I am 100% certain that I received an S in one of the three victories with her today, and did not receive a chest for it. I bought her yesterday, and there's absolutely no way that I imagine the S today. I distinctly remember it, and I went to the boards as soon as I could. I just want to know what caused the issue, and I need to be confident that I'll be able to get my future chests.

This has happened again. I am absolutely and utterly outraged. I just got an S+ this time, here 

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2434367181/233594212?tab=overview.

Pictures will follow. How is this happening?

Here are links to images:

https://ibb.co/bzbY0a
https://ibb.co/dnPLfa
https://ibb.co/jjyJYv
https://ibb.co/iySqfa

The first image shows that I own Katarina. 

The second image shows that I own Katarina (via my mastery being over level four), shows that I have received an S+ with her, and shows that I have not received a chest for her. 

The third and fourth images show that I owned Katarina at the time of the game (via my mastery being over level four), show that I definitively received an S+ on her, and show that I did not receive a chest after that game. 

Um... How? I don't understand.

Thanks for the detailed information and screenshots.  It looks like that even though you have her unlocked now, your account is actually out of mastery chest drops now.  You can check how many mastery chests you are eligible for through your profile, similarly to how many rerolls you might have in ARAM.   Per the [hextech crafting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide), one will refresh each week, so hang on until then in order to grab another chest.  

> You have four chest slots in your profile; once you’ve earned four chests, you won’t be able to earn more until a chest slot unlocks. Chest slots unlock seven days from when you first locked the slot, but only one slot unlocks at a time.

I hope that helps!

Okay, thank you.  I apologize, and I'm super grateful for the information! I am relatively new, and have just acquired the skill to get multiple chests, so I had no idea there was a cap. Thanks again!
